name: ColorBlinded - Only One Color
description:
Move with arrow keys 

Q - switch to yellow view(walls)

W - switch to green view (keys&door)

E -  switch to red view(enemies)

R - restart when lose

Try your best to avoid enemies and collect keys to the open door to escape. 

Pay attention to the sound enemies made when they saw you. Avoid line of sight with corridors. Best of luck.

-Added tuitorials and some bgm . 

All sound gotten from https://www.bensound.com and https://freesound.org/
